title: Can only play a a couple games before client sound stutters, a few after it cuts out completely
body: Just missed a queue because I can't hear client sounds. I can only play like two games before my client sound stutters/lags/etchos/reverbs I don't know how to describe it. If I play another game or two I lose it completely. Game gets ~120 fps, but even with low settings the client just suck. I have to reboot to get the client to work again. Not sure what to do.

replies.body:
ok, reddit blamed by computer. 3 games in, 20-25% memory and cpu usage, client has started getting choppy.

This is amateur.

Yeeeaaaa that client shouldn't be eating up that many resources, so I'm concerned that either your pc is having a hard time running the game or somehow your client was damaged. Run a quick repair through the client options, and while you're there turn on **low-spec mode** and give it shot. Let me know if that doesn't seem to help at all and we can dig a little deeper!
